near Grantaire , an almost silent table , a sheet of paper , an inkstand and a pen between two glasses of brandy , announced that a vaudeville was being sketched out .格朗泰尔在低声吟哦。紧靠着格朗泰尔的，是一张几乎冷冷清清的桌子、一张纸、一瓶墨水和一支笔，放在两个小酒杯中间，宣告着一个闹剧剧本正在酝酿。

means.word_mean: 1. a small well holding writing ink into which a pen can be dipped
2. a tray or stand for writing implements and containers for ink
